features: Grisi Sulfur Soap is the best bar soap for acne. It will also help you reduce inflammation, reduce acne's effects, and prevent them from reappearing in the future. Look smoother skin!
Our acne soap utilizes natural sulfur's healing properties by removing dead skin cells, opening clogged pores, and preventing breakouts, blackheads, or excess oil on the skin.
Grisi Sulfur reduces facial shine, leaving a matte effect. Our soap will help you reduce pimples and acne by removing bacteria and absorbing excess oil by unclogging the skin's pores.

What is more, it lasts for a reasonably long time. It has antifungal and antibacterial properties. It helps to combat germs, bacteria, fungus, and much more. And for extra moisturization, it includes lanolin. Go for smoother skin!

With a 10% sulfur concentration, you will notice a change in a short time; its foam quite quickly spreads on your face and body well. It does not have a powerful scent and does not require lots of water to rinse off.
body.description: Grisi Sulfur Soap, when used regularly, is effective in treating acne. Our product removes dirt, unclogs pores, balances oil production, and helps remove harmful bacteria from the skin, reducing irritation. We recommend using this product in conjunction with our sulfur ointment and Madre Perla whitening cream for the best results. We formulated our soap with 10% sulfur, one of the oldest known acne treatments. This soap contains lanolin to help heal and visibly improve the damaged skin from acne, reducing irritation. If you use our soap continuously, it will help you clear acne and prevent future breakouts. Our sulfur soap is widely known for its excellent skin cleansing properties. Sulfur is a mineral in the human body and is present in all living tissues. It will help you make your skin look healthier by getting rid of pimples and blackheads and removing dead cells. Remember, two gentle washes a day are enough. Too much cleaning can leave skin irritated and dry, causing the glands to produce more oil. Your face will look smoother, and it will also help reduce inflammation. Say goodbye to acne with Grisi Sulfur Soap!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this soap!
reviews.reviewText: It smells good, it makes your skin feel great! Your skin will heal and be healthy. Be careful not to get it in your eyes, it will burn. But I love it! Going to use it all the time for my family 💗

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It has helped my itchy skin, and soften it. It does have some sulfer scent, but it's not bad. Would definely reorder.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Look, 2 months ago something appeared on my skin and I have used all the resources in creams and even prescription pills and nothing worked for me, with the first use of this soap I saw a change and after 2 weeks everything is excellent, a secret, Leave it on the skin for a while, if possible overnight and it will remember me, it's wonderful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars This soap does the job
reviews.reviewText: The soap has a weird smell but it definitely helped dry up the bug bites. This isn’t an everyday soap but more of an ‘as needed basis’.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I've had a stubborn patch on my face that just wouldn't clear up. I'm in my mid-40s and have been struggling with this for years. After two weeks you can barely see any of the past inflamation and all of my skin is smoother and brighter! I wish I had started using this soap 10 years ago. Also the fact that you can get three bars for less than the price of one of the other brands is a huge plus. I only noticed the scent the first two days I used it after that I don't smell it outside of the shower at all. I even asked my husband and co-worker if they could smell me and neither one of them could. Overall this soap is great and I will continue to use this brand as long as I can.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amo este producto
reviews.reviewText: Este jabón que está echo de azufre es el mejor. No es la primera vez que lo uso y es súper bueno para los granitos de la cara los seca súper rápido y la cara queda hermosa

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I got this originally to get rid of smells since I saw a review talking about how they used it to get rid of smells but this thing reeks. It smells like rotting eggs my restroom doesn't have much ventilation and this thing made me feel so weird when I was done with it the fumes are too strong. It also lingered on the skin I tried to wash it off with another soap I had it didn't do me any good and it burned my eyes. maybe try a different brand if your thinking on useing this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 3, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This soap relieves itching and has a pleasant fragrance
reviews.reviewText: I researched sulfur soap because I was bitten by chiggers and had itchy whelps. I'm particularly allergic to chiggers so the discomfort can last for a week with me. Researching treatment for chigger bites, the remedy is dabbing the bites with rubbing alcohol then bathing using sulfur soap to relieve the itching. I tried it and it worked. I also suffer from chronic skin itchiness on my back. I used a handheld back scratching device multiple times during the day. So, I tried it on my back too. The itching disappeared immediately and hasn't returned.In some comments, a few suggested the soap smells 'bad'. I was expecting something off-putting but that isn't the case at all. For me, it is a very pleasant smell and immediately reminded me of something I've smelled before - sandalwood. Mysore soap from India has sandalwood fragrance in it. I love the smell of Mysore soap. The fragrance in this sulfur soap is much more subtle than that of Mysore soap but I definitely detect it. Sandalwood has a very pleasant incense note. I looked at the package contents and it simply lists 'fragrance'. I'm very happy with this soap and will continue using it every other day or so. I'm concerned that using it more often may dry my skin.
